landing_page.welcome_text: Stay ahead in the fast-changing world of media with our Automated Press Analysis Tool. Keep your client teams informed and prepared with daily press reviews, personalized to your needs. Our platform extracts and compiles the most relevant news articles into concise, anonymized reports – delivered directly to your inbox each morning. Save time, stay informed, and focus on what matters most – delivering value to your clients.
landing_page.credits: MediaMind was build in cooperation between EUTOP, the Technical University of Munich and CSEE during the Javascript Technology Practicum.

confirmation_dialog.title: Are you sure?
confirmation_dialog.delete_text: This will permanently delete this entity
confirmation_dialog.leave_text: Unsaved changes will be permanently lost

general.public_text: A public profile can be viewed by anyone in your organization, while a private profile is only visible to you.
general.language_text: Specify the language of the report and topic & keywords. If the language is changed, these content settings of the profile should also be adjusted.

topics.topic_error: Can't add the same topic twice
topics.info: Manage topics and keywords for news monitoring
topics.label: Topic:

mailing.info: Configure profile contact database for press release distribution

subscriptions.info: Configure web scraping sources used for the external mailing list

admin.orga_text: Make changes to your Organizations here. You can add, edit or delete them
admin.subs_text: Make changes to your Subscriptions here. You can add, edit or delete them

organization-dialog.edit_text: Edit your organization here. Click save when you're done.
organization-dialog.add_text: Enter the name of the Organization you want to add. Click save when you're done.
organization-dialog.name_error_text: Please insert a valid Organization Name
organization-dialog.email_error_text: Please insert a valid and unique email address.

subscription-dialog.edit_text: Edit your Subscription here. Click save when you're done.
subscription-dialog.add_text: Enter the name of the Subscription you want to add. Click save when you're done.

article-page.keywords_text: Displays matched profile topics with keywords, and a score indicating topic relevance to the article.

breaking-news.entry: Click here to view the latest breaking news!
